org.asoem.greyfish.utils.math.statistics

Class StatisticalTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.asoem.greyfish.utils.math.statistics.StatisticalTests

  • public final class StatisticalTests
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for statistical tests.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static FTest f(double[] sample1, double[] sample2)
      Performs an F test to compare the variances of two samples from normal populations.

      Performs the Shapiro-Wilk test of normality.

    • Method Detail

      • f

        public static FTest f(double[] sample1,
                      double[] sample2)
        Performs an F test to compare the variances of two samples from normal populations.

        Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/F-test

        Parameters:
        sample1 - the first sample
        sample2 - the second sample
        Returns:
        a test summary

      • shapiroWilk

        public static ShapiroWilkTest shapiroWilk(double[] sample)
        Performs the Shapiro-Wilk test of normality.

        This algorithm is limited to samples of size in the range [3, 5000]

        Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shapiro_wilk

        Parameters:
        sample - the sample to test
        Returns:
        the test summary
